articles.description:

articles.title: European soccer championships get underway a year later, a test in the pandemic era - CBC.ca
articles.description: The signature European soccer championships event, postponed last year, kicked off Friday with the first of 51 matches played in 11 cities around the continent, the first tournament of its kind in the pandemic era.
articles.content:
